about_the_game:
This is a demo version of [Simple Rolling].

The game consists of two modes – Level Mode and Creative Mode. The demo version contains about 1/4 of the content of the full version.
The game was developed using the UE4 engine, and the game operation is based on real-time physics simulation and physical destruction effects.

Level Mode:
The demo version contains 4 scenes, a total of 4 levels, and the level contains more than 10 kinds of mechanism props and timing functions, which can challenge the fastest level.

Creative Mode:
The demo version has 4 map save slots. There are 4 scenes to choose from, you can customize the map name, and there are a total of 150+ objects in 6 categories to choose from. Maps can be added, removed, and saved at will. At the same time, you can also play with maps you created, which also have a timing function.

name: Simple Rolling Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Let's get to the finish line with the boules ball!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Korean
